description: STRING No. 55 // From 2020-02-01 // By Jonas Kasper Jensen www.jonaskasperjensen.com // Size 110 cm x 140 cm // On the shore of the metaverse is a depiction of what Jensen imagines it will look like when the first humans settle in the metaverse. A colorful, stormy, dangerous journey.
name: On the shore of the metaverse
